title: Earth Disasters - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/27/19
itunes:title: Earth Disasters - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/27/19
description:
George Noory and astronomer Bob Berman explore his research on how the Earth and Moon were formed, how many times all life on Earth has been wiped out, and whether another man made or other worldly disaster could kill all living things on the planet again.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
